nodes.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            This plugin needs to be configured with a lit of annotations, then it will generate a parameterless constructor for each class annotated with them.
          
          
            
            This plugin needs to be configured with a list of annotations, then it will generate a parameterless constructor for each class annotated with them.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -565,6 +565,21 @@ data class Person @BsonCreator constructor (
 ): PanacheMongoEntity()
 ----
 
+The last option is to the use the link:https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/compiler-plugins.html#no-arg-compiler-plugin[no-arg] compiler plugin.
+This plugin needs to be configured with a lit of annotations, then it will generate a parameterless constructor for each class annotated with them.

nodes.bodyText:
I would suggest:

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            This plugin needs to be configured with a lit of annotations, then it will generate a parameterless constructor for each class annotated with them.
          
          
            
            This plugin is configured with a list of annotations, and the end result is the generation of no-args constructor for each class annotated with them.
